body: Welcome to the team! I've created your first tasks. Start with TASK-001 (project scaffolding) â€” it's highest priority. Set up package.json with proper scripts, add express/fastify, eslint, prettier, jest, and create the folder structure (src/, tests/, docs/). Once scaffolding is done, move to TASK-002 (CI/CD). Check 'octeams available' for your task list. Claim tasks with 'octeams claim TASK-NNN'.
